eeye pawathi palanga shuratha awasan purwa wataye di pilipinayata erehiwa lakunu 42-0ka wishishta jayak athkara ganimin palanga shuratha awasan maha tharagayata sudusukam labimata shri lanka kridikawo samathwuha.eheth awasan maha tharagaye di thayilanthaya wethin lakunu 25-5ka parajayak athwindimin palanga anushurathawen sahimakata pathwimata shri lanka kantha pilata siduwiya.me tharagamalawe palamu adiyara lesa pasugiya agosthuwe di honkon hi pawathi tharagawaliye palanga shuratha awasan maha tharagaye di thayilanthayata erehiwa lakunu 19-14ka jayak wartha karamin palanga shurathawa dina gath shri lanka kridikawan mewara owun idiriye parajayata pathwima wisheshathwayaki.mewara pirimi tharagawaliye kusalanaya lakunu 36-19kin dakunu koriyawa parajayata path kala honkon pilata himiwu athara kantha tharaga isawwe shurathawa dinaganu labuwe lakunu 24-19kin chinaya parajayata pathkala japanaya wisini.
